title: Andrew Tate incident ends G2’s bid for ‘Valorant’ partnership slot
description: G2 Esports appeared confident in its North American “Valorant” partnership application. At the last moment, the company's CEO jeopardized the whole thing.

title: Florida brings battle over social media regulation to the Supreme Court
description: The state attorney general filed a petition to the Court on Wednesday, after two lower courts split on decisions about social media laws.

title: Twitch cracks down on gambling, but streamers aren’t sure it’s enough
description: “In its current wording, this isn’t even close to a luck-based gambling ban,” agency head and industry insider Devin Nash told The Washington Post.

title: ‘Grand Theft Auto VI’ leak is Rockstar’s nightmare, YouTubers’ dream
description: Leaks benefit no one — besides content creators looking to reap rewards from outsize interest in an unfinished game.

title: Xbox wants Japan, but so far it’s an unrequited love
description: “It’s taken us a long time for us to learn from our mistakes," said Sarah Bond, Xbox corporate vice president of game creator experience and ecosystem.

title: How to customize your lock screen and 9 other iOS 16 tricks
description: Change your clock font, get the cool widgets and 8 other tricks you can try on your iPhone with iOS 16.

title: These planes are battery operated. Will that fly?
description: Airlines including United, Mesa and Air Canada have started putting orders in for Heart Aerospace ES-30, a battery-operated plane that seats up to 30 people.
